title: President Biden Announces Presidential Delegation to Ukraine to Attend the Crimea Platform Summit and 30th Anniversary of Independence | The White House
content: President Joseph R. Biden, Jr. today announced the designation of a Presidential Delegation to Kyiv, Ukraine to attend the Crimea Platform Summit and events of the 30th Anniversary of Independence on August 23-24, 2021.The Honorable Jennifer M. Granholm, Secretary of Energy, will lead the delegation.Members of the Presidential Delegation:Ms. Kristina Kvien, Chargé d’Affaires ad interim, U.S. Embassy KyivDr. Andrew Light, Assistant Secretary for International Affairs, U.S. Department of Energy###
